Description: Great 4 bedroom, centrally located in Savin Hill! This unit has great natural light, hardwood floors throughout, stainless steel appliances granite counter tops and in unit washer/dryer. Spacious bedrooms and living room and remodeled bathroom. Large private back deck. Pet friendly and professionally managed. Only first and Security deposit due up front, owners paying broker fee! Great neighborhood less than10 min walk to Savin Hill T stop and some great restaurants like McKinna's Cafe, Honeycomb Cafe, Savin Hill Bar & Grill and Harp + Bard.
